name: Buck Bear Hunter 2016- free deer hunting games
name_original: Buck Bear Hunter 2016- free deer hunting games
description:
Buck Bear Hunter 2016 is the 3D deer hunting game with great 3d graphics, a dear hunter simulator game.

Feature:
- Tilt & Touch controls.
- Amazing graphics and sound effects.
- 1 different style scene.
- unlock new weapons and scene by hunting the deer.
